mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.`permission` FROM `sys_menu` m LEFT JOIN `sys_role_menu` rm ON rm.`menu_id` = m.`menu_id` LEFT JOIN `sys_role` r ON r.`role_id` = rm.`role_id` LEFT JOIN `sys_user_role` ur ON ur.`role_id` = rm.`role_id` LEFT JOIN `sys_user` u ON u.`user_id` = ur.`user_id` WHERE u.`user_id` = #{userId} AND m.`menu_type` IN (2, 3) AND m.`status` = 1 AND r.`status` = 1
